title: Josephus Problem
Tower of Hanoi Steps

explanation.analogy: Doubles with each disk added, minus 1.

title: Egg Drop Problem

steps: With k tries, can cover k(k+1)/2 floors

title: Water Jug Problem

explanation.approach: Possible if z divides gcd(x,y) and z <= x+y.
explanation.analogy: Can only measure multiples of GCD.

title: Monty Hall

explanation.analogy: Initial choice is 1/3, other two are 2/3. Host reveals one, so switch gets 2/3.

title: Birthday Paradox

explanation.approach: Calculate probability of all different birthdays.
explanation.analogy: With 23 people, >50% chance of shared birthday.

title: Prisoner Hat Problem

explanation.approach: First person encodes parity, guarantees n-1 saves.
explanation.analogy: First person says parity of black hats ahead.

title: Bridge Crossing

explanation.approach: Use fastest as shuttle or pair slowest.
explanation.analogy: Balance between fast returning and slow pairing.

title: Weighing Balls

explanation.approach: Divide into 3 groups, one weighing eliminates 2/3.

title: Chessboard Rice
